quote_last: , Seb marched into the bank and said to the receptionist, “I have an appointment with Mr. Kaufman.”
title: Mightier Than the Sword
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: I let him put me in the car and drive me to the station. At
quote_last: by the clock in the station house I was in front of a cell in the Mill River jail.
title: At Catskill Eagle
author: Robert B. Parker
